title: Nodge while using apps
content:
Hey, 
First of love the new pixel very smooth as always been a fan since the pixel 2 and finally upgraded.

The new camera is now integrated in the screen which does not bother me while being on the main screen or scrolling threw the web, but if I open games or netflix there will be suddenly a cut off/nodge just beneath the camera. 

Is there an option where I can stop the pixel from doing so or is there something out there that can fix that? 

Thanks for your help in advance 

Jonathan Trabold
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
